title: Calories in a McDonald's Cookie
meta_description: Discover calories in a McDonald's cookie, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, fat, protein, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's chocolate chip cookie (about 38 g), baked fresh in-store, no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and exact recipe changes; check McDonald's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A McDonald's chocolate chip cookie has about 170 kcal and 2 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add a scoop of vanilla soft serve on top
Oatmeal raisin cookie instead of chocolate chip

faqs.q: How many calories in a McDonald's chocolate chip cookie?
What are the carbs in a McDonald's cookie?
faqs.a: About 21 g carbs, including 13 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a McDonald's cookie high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 9 g total fat with 4 g saturated per cookie.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a McDonald's cookie?
Do McDonald's cookies have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat per cookie.
